AppTive

CyKick CS

Cy-kick CS liquid concentrate insecticide provides 90 days of full-throttle killing power, controlling insects indoors and outdoors. The active ingredient is Cyfluthrin.

Cyfluthrin acts as a stomach poison and through contact with the insect. By attacking the nerves, cyfluthrin causes constant muscle spasms. Eventually, the insect is paralyzed or starves.

    Target Pests:
  • Ants (carpenter)
  • Cockroaches
  • Crickets
  • Earwigs
  • Fleas
  • Flies
  • Mosquitos
  • Silverfish
  • Spiders
  • Springtails
  • Ticks
